tool_description:
Send messages into chats using telegram bot.
Only should you have telegram bot token and chat  id
name: Telegram Messaging
title: Telegram Messaging

api_list.name: Send Message Multiple Chats
api_list.description:
Send message into multiple telegram chats.
You should have telegram bot token and  chat ids
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://telegram-messaging.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/telegram/sendmessage-multiple"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "telegram-messaging.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Send Message One Chat
api_list.description:
send message into telegram chat.
telegram bot token and chat id required.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://telegram-messaging.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/telegram/sendmessage"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "telegram-messaging.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
